moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nc3 Bc5 3. Nf3 Qf6 4. Bc4 Qf: Moving my porn to d4 means white will come out on top no matter what black does.
moves.5... Qxc1: ? this was not a good move on blacks behalf for it was possible to save his Queen.
moves.6. Rxc1: Then of course white take blacks Queen with his rook.
moves.6... exd4: Then starts a battle for the center of the board.
moves.7. Nxd4: But black finishes it and retreats.
moves.7... Bb4 8. Qf3: White then gets into a position to attack...
moves.9. Qxf7+: So whites queen moves forward and checks the Queen while being protected by Bishop c4.
moves.9... Kd8: Black is forced to move in to a corner.
moves.10... dxe6: ...and it is blacks only option to take whites knight.
moves.11. Rd1+: White attacks from a different angle leaving black even fewer options.
moves.11... Nd4 12. Rxd4+ Bd6: After these turn of events black has no chose but to block the rook with Bishop d6.
moves.13. Nb5: So white attacks the last deffending piece...
moves.13... Nh6: ...but is slowed from and attack from blacks knight h6.
moves.14. Qxg7: So white to counter attack this moves to attack both blacks Rook and Knight.
moves.14... e5: Black ignoring this statment pushes forward his porn to attack whites Rook.
moves.15. Qxh8+: So white takes blacks Rook and places his king in check.
moves.15... Ke7 16. Rd5 Be6: Black moves his bishop to e6 leaving his rook open to be taken by the Queen.
moves.17. Qxa8 Bxd5 18. Bxd5: So with black losing hope he tries a forthless attempt to check the king...
moves.18... Bb4+ 19. Ke2: ...Alowing white to move out his king freeing his rook to a certain extent.
moves.19... Ng4 20. Rd1 Bc5 21. Qg8: White pulls his Queen out from the corner of the board.
moves.21... Nxf2 22. Qxh7+: White goes in once again for the attack...
moves.22... Kf6: ...and black moves away turning the rest of the game in to a cat chases mouse scenario.
moves.23. Qf5+ Ke7 24. Qf7+ Kd8 25. Be6+ Nxd1: White ends the game after backing black on to the back of the board.

gameName: A game I played with my Dad that I recorded
